other_tests.findings: Bilateral symmetric moderate to severe sensorineural hearing loss, more pronounced in higher frequencies.
other_tests.changes_over_time: One year later, the audiologist recommended a hearing aid consultation. Two months after the initial fitting of her hearing aid, Mrs N did not feel that her quality of life had improved.

other_tests.findings: Mrs N was fitted with a hearing aid for her left ear, programmed for two settings: one for normal wear and one for public settings.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Despite initial dissatisfaction and struggling with the adaptation, she noted improvement in hearing. A new hearing aid fitting was performed for better volume control.
